# NSSaveOptions.ask

**Case**

Indicates the user should be asked before saving any modified documents on closing. When no option is specified, this is the default.

## Declaration

```swift
case ask
```

## Constants

- **NSSaveOptions.yes**: Indicates a modified document should be saved on closing without asking the user.
- **NSSaveOptions.no**: Indicates a modified document should not be saved on closing.
